brewery tour

20/8/2019

Rooster was literally started in a backyard with one guy, one tiny system and a huge level of determination. This meant that creativity and ingenuity to get the job done was paramount. When we couldn’t afford something we made it, fabricating our own tanks, keg cleaning equipment, cooling systems, and brew house. To put it mildly, it wasn’t easy.
